description.narrative: The Project is to rehabilitate about 140 kilometers (km) of provincial roads in Northern Province and 170 km of national roads in Northern Province and North Central Province (NPC). The Project will help restore accessibility to essential social services for rural people in NP and improve its nationwide connectivity.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Highways and Road Development
State Ministry of Provincial Councils & Local Government Affairs (formerly Ministry of Public Services, Provincial Councils and Local Government)

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved road connectivity within Northern Province and to the southern region of the country.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Travel time from Colombo (national capital) to Jaffna (Northern provincial capital) is reduced by 38% (from 13 hours in 2010 to 8 hours)

description.narrative: Improved road connectivity within Northern Province and to the southern region of the country.

title.narrative: Accident rate (fatalities by vehicle-km) is reduced by 20% from 2010 rate.

description.narrative: Improved road connectivity within Northern Province and to the southern region of the country.

title.narrative:
By project completion (2019):
Travel time on project roads reduced by an average of 20% from 2010 in Northern Province and North Central Province.
